ROM.Changelog:
##### Android 8.0.1 - Mx5 Build 18.5.19
Details are fully available on Hybrid Development Team's blog.
* Performance tweaks and improvements * Minor user interface tweaks and changes
**Updates to the following applications:**
* AndroidFrameworkRes > **MX5.1_2018B** * ClockPackage > **MX5.1_2018A** * Messaging > **MX5.1_2018A** * SamsungContacts > **42_MX5.1** * SecGallery > **2018A** * SecMyFiles > **2018A_MX5.1** * TouchWizHome > **2018B_Hybrid**
**If you download updates over a data connection or while roaming, additional data charges may apply. It is advised to keep your device fully charged during the update.**
